title: Pixelon Wide
content:
Here is my first ever font...Pixelon Wide   
Comments welcome   
Matthew Brown   
 ![Pixelon wide](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414200123im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/747.gif)
author: matthew_dob

comments.content: it's hard to make a bitmap font unique, especially if you're aiming for small size + readablility, congratulations!
